name: No Rush!
description:
Welcome to No Rush! A runner where you can't just run as fast as you can! You play as a spy who has a bomb strapped to his chest, and you have to quickly get to the next operative to disarm it, and it's the middle of winter, so all the roads are slippery, too! 

You move using WASD and SPACE to jump. Moving increases your heart rate, while stopping slows it. If it reaches 225, the bomb will explode! Make it to the next operative before that happens!
